Member Data Documentation

Gwen::Controls::Base* Gwen::Event::Information::Control

These are set by the event and may or may not be set.

Gwen::Controls::Base* Gwen::Event::Information::ControlCaller

This is set by the event caller, it will always be the control which is calling the event.

Gwen::ControlList Gwen::Event::Information::ControlList
int Gwen::Event::Information::Integer
Gwen::Event::Packet* Gwen::Event::Information::Packet

This is set by the event hook, e.g. :-

onDoSomething.Add( this, &ThisClass::MyFunction, Gwen::Event::Packet("Something") );
